dataset.title: Nitrite of Lake Cedrino and Temo (SI001231 Sardinian Lake Ecosystems) in 2012

section.para: This dataset includes nitrite data taken in two research sites (Lake Cedrino and Temo) of the site Sardinian Lake Ecosystems as part of LTER Italy. Samples were collected as representative of each season during 2012. Data comprise measurements in the water column ad different depth from surface to the bottom.

para.literalLayout: Nitrate is quantitatively reduced to nitrite by passage of the sample through a column containing copper coated cadmium. The nitrate (reduced nitrate plus original nitrite) is determined by diazotizing with sulfanilamide dihydrochloride. The resulting water soluble dye has a magenta color which is read at 520 nm.

section.para: In the point of maximum depth of the lake. Water samples are collected at different depths (surface, 1, 2.5, 5, 7.5, 10, 15, 20 and at intervals of 10 m to the bottom) with a Niskin bottle and placed in a dark cooler box and packed in ice at the time of collection
